<tr><td>

[@shlack/types](./types.md)


</td><td>

<img src="https://placecorgi.herokuapp.com/300/250" align="right" />

<h3>Why does this library exist?</h3>

`@shlack/types` is a package containing broadly-useful types and type guards for our demo slack app. This is part of Mike's <b>JS &amp; TS Monorepos Course</b> which you can learn more about by visiting <a href="https://github.com/mike-north/js-ts-monorepos/" target="_blank"> the repo on GitHub </a>

If you want to watch a recorded video of this course, look for it on <a href="https://frontendmasters.com" target="_blank">FrontEnd Masters</a>


</td></tr>
